# GRAPHICS::DRAW_MARKER_SPHERE

## Summary
Draws a sphere marker this frame

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** scrVecPositionX
* **FLOAT** scrVecPositionY
* **FLOAT** scrVecPositionZ
* **FLOAT** radius: The direction the marker should face col - the colour of the marker (0-255 for each component)
* **INT** colR
* **INT** colG
* **INT** colB
* **FLOAT** intensity: Intensity of the sphere (similar behaviour to alpha)

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Draws a sphere marker of better quality than the markers one. ONLY ONE PER FRAME IS SUPPORTED.

Draws a 3D sphere, typically seen in the GTA:O freemode event "Penned In".
Example https://imgur.com/nCbtS4H
